data.fullContent: Open Educational Resource (OER) is content developed and offered freely for the purpose of teaching and learning. The digitized material allows for open development and reuse. Because of copyright laws, OERs either remain in the public domain or permit reuse through an intellectual property license or other copyright accommodation. OER's include education course content and materials, digitized textbooks, streaming videos, software, and other materials used to support and convey knowledge.
data.answer: 开放教育资源(OER)是为教学和学习的目的而自由开发和提供的内容。数字化的材料允许开放的开发和重用。由于版权法的规定，OERs要么保留在公共领域，要么通过知识产权许可或其他版权许可允许重用。OER包括教育课程内容和材料、数字化教科书、流媒体视频、软件和用于支持和传递知识的其他材料。
